translation.en: When I was born, the world was a far simpler place.
translation.zh: 我刚出生时的世界单纯多了

translation.en: It was all just cops and robbers.
translation.zh: 只是警察和抢匪的游戏

translation.en: Fucking get down! Get down now!
And you! Stay down! Stay down!
But it wasn't for me.
translation.zh: 等我长大，一切都不一样了

translation.en: Then came the Summer of Love.
Hashish and LSD arrived on the scene.
translation.zh: 印度大麻和迷幻药出现

translation.en: There were villains locked away for 12 years...
...for robbing a bank of 10 grand...
...doing time with drippy hippies doing 12 months...
translation.zh: 走私两百万英镑毒品的痞子

translation.en: ...for smuggling 2 million quid's worth of puff.
I mean, work it out, mate. We're in the wrong fucking game.
Drugs changed everything.
Always remember that one day this drug monkey-business will be legal.
translation.zh: 要记住，贩毒总有一天会合法

translation.en: They won't leave it to people like me when they figure out...
...how much money there is to be made: not millions, fucking billions.
translation.zh: 是不会让我这种人独享的 商机不是数百万，而是数十亿

translation.en: Recreational Drugs plc. Giving people what they want.
translation.zh: 休闲药品公司 提供人们想要的

translation.en: Good times today, stupor tomorrow.
But this is now.
So, until prohibition ends, make hay while the sun shines.
translation.zh: 毒品还没开放前 能捞就尽量捞吧

translation.en: I'm not a gangster.
I'm a businessman whose commodity happens to be cocaine.
translation.zh: 我只是买卖古柯碱的生意人

translation.en: Ten years ago, charlie was for pop stars or a celebrity's birthday bash.
translation.zh: 十年前，摇滚明星或名人派对 才吸毒助兴

translation.en: It was demonized by Daily Mail readers getting drunk in wine bars.
translation.zh: 毒品被酒吧的酒客妖魔化了

translation.en: Now they're my biggest clients.
translation.zh: 如今他们是我最大的客户

translation.en: This is Clarkie. Double first at Cambridge in Industrial Chemistry.
translation.zh: 这是克拉奇 剑桥大学化工系高材生

translation.en: Well, he's gotta pay off his student loan somehow.
translation.zh: 他得想办法还助学贷款

translation.en: Today, I only deal in kilos.
translation.zh: 现在我销货都以公斤计

translation.en: Depending which tariff you use...
...that'll cost you either 28 grand or 15 years in prison...
translation.zh: 不是让你花上两万八 就是坐牢１５年

translation.en: ...which is more time than a rapist.
C'est la vie.
It is vital that we work to a few golden rules.
translation.zh: 我们的工作有些黄金准则

translation.en: Always work in a small team.
Keep a very low profile. Only deal with people who come recommended.
translation.zh: 低调再低调 只跟熟客推荐的人交易

translation.en: It's like selling anything:
washing machines, handmade shoes, blowjobs.
As long as you don't take the piss, people will come back for more.
translation.zh: 只要不乱搞 客人都会再光顾

translation.en: That's not to say we don't weave that magic that makes two kilos three...
translation.zh: 这不是说 我们不干偷斤减两的事

translation.en: ...but never be too greedy.
Know and respect your enemy.
It is only very, very stupid people who think the law is stupid.
translation.zh: 只有傻瓜才认为警察很蠢

translation.en: And avoid like the fucking plague...
...loud, attention-seeking wannabe gangsters...
...in it for the glory, to be a face, to be a name.
Hello, Slavo. Yeah, it's the Duke.
Everything's sweet. When can we meet?
They don't mean to fuck up. They just do.
translation.zh: 他们不是故意搞砸的 但他们就是会搞砸

translation.en: Forgive me for stating the obvious, but stay away from the end-user.
translation.zh: 原谅我把话说白 不要接触最末端的顾客

translation.en: They are guaranteed to bring you trouble.
As do guns.
I hate guns. And violence.
But as some Roman general once said:
"If you seek peace, plan for war."
Morty and his assistant Terry, they watch my back.
translation.zh: 莫提和助理泰瑞保护我

translation.en: Morty learnt caution the hard way. He did 10 years inside.
translation.zh: 莫提从惨痛经验得到教训 蹲过十年牢

translation.en: He's my bridge to the criminal world...
translation.zh: 他是我跟犯罪世界的桥梁

translation.en: ...and he ensures that the traffic is one-way.
Look, there's Amsterdam, and there's Oofdorfe...dorfe.
translation.zh: 有阿姆斯特丹，还有乌多夫…

translation.en: Not a fucking clue. None of them speak English.
translation.zh: 搞不懂，他们都不会说英语

translation.en: -Get in the car. I'm sure it's that way. -Move up.
-I bet you it's that way. -We've already been that way.
translation.zh: -跟你保证是那个方向 -我们走过那边了

translation.en: Yeah, but we're gonna go that way again. Give us the map.
translation.zh: 我们要再走一次 地图拿来

translation.en: Oh, don't start, the pair of you.
translation.zh: 你们两个不要又抬杠了

translation.en: It's like being out with a pair of kids.
translation.zh: 简直像跟两个小孩出来一样

translation.en: -All day you've been moaning. -It can't be that difficult.
translation.zh: -你们整天哎哎叫 -哪有那么难

translation.en: How many fucking greenhouses can there be?
Morty.
Terence.
Clarkie.
Very, very important: pay your supplier prompt.
translation.zh: 最重要的是 付钱给供货商要快

translation.en: In our case, that's Mr. Jimmy Price. He's the top of the pyramid.
translation.zh: 我们的供货商是普吉米先生 他位在金字塔最顶端

translation.en: Pay him. In full, on time, without fail, no short counts.
translation.zh: 准时付清不啰唆、不亏欠

translation.en: You get no second chances. Jimmy calls the shots.
translation.zh: 没有第二次机会，吉米说了算

translation.en: Where the fuck is Gene?
-I don't know. Ask me one on sport. -What time does your watch tell?
translation.zh: -不知道，运动明星我比较清楚 -你的表几点？

translation.en: -The same as yours. -He's never late.
Shut the fuck up.
Patience.
Gene here is Jimmy's right-hand man.
Been with him since way back.
All the drugs and cash go through Gene.
translation.zh: 所有毒品和现金都由金恩经手

translation.en: Jimmy trusts him with his life.
By the way, Jimmy would like to see you tomorrow for a spot of lunch.
translation.zh: 对了，吉米找你明天吃午饭

translation.en: Wait a minute. Is there a problem?
Why does everybody assume there's a problem because he wants a word?
Maybe he's grateful. He fucking should be.
translation.zh: 也许他很感激，他是该感激

translation.en: See you at Stoke Park at 1.
This is just so beautiful.
We need to get in and out of here sharpish.
Paul and the tide ain't gonna wait.
Everyone likes to walk through a door marked "Private."
translation.zh: 大家都爱走〝非请勿入〞的门

translation.en: Therefore, have a good reason to be affluent.
translation.zh: 这成了当有钱人的好理由

translation.en: I own a share in a very successful letting agency.
translation.zh: 我在一家成功借贷公司拥有股份

translation.en: It gives me an honest income. Looks good on the self-assessment.
translation.zh: 它让我荷包满满 我自己也觉得很体面

translation.en: Whereas years ago scallywags were trying to get money out of banks...
translation.zh: 以前是想 怎么把银行的钱弄到手

translation.en: ...now your problem is how to get your ill-gotten gains in.
translation.zh: 现在问题是 怎么把不义之财放进银行

translation.en: That's a job for Mr. Singh. He does my laundry.
translation.zh: 那是辛先生的工作 他负责帮我洗钱

translation.en: And in a week, it will be ready for collection...
...in the form of a nice clean check for a round million.
translation.zh: 就会变成干净的百万支票

translation.en: The business is on the up and up.
But I've always said, have a plan and stick to it.
translation.zh: 但我总认为拟定计划 就确实执行

translation.en: Quit while you're ahead.
So barring any fuck-ups, I'm leaving it all behind.
No, we got the parcel.
Yeah, better than expected, actually.
It's just that things have gone a little bit slightly turbo this end.
translation.zh: 只是这里的情况有点混乱

translation.en: Come on, boys, lively, lively.
If we miss this tide, we're not going anywhere till daylight.
translation.zh: 错过这次涨潮 天亮前就别想走了

translation.en: Paul, you ain't being paid to moan.
translation.zh: 保罗，我不是请你来抱怨的

translation.en: You're being paid to get my cargo home.
Come on, babe. You all right? Careful here, it's a bit wobbly.
translation.zh: 宝贝，没事吧？ 小心，有点不稳

translation.en: Life is so fucking good, I can taste it in my spit.
translation.zh: 人生真美好，连口水都感觉到

translation.en: I'll treat tomorrow's lunch like the Last Supper, feign interest in his tales.
translation.zh: 明天中午就算是最后晚餐 假装对他的故事有兴趣

translation.en: And then leave quietly forever.
This is pure class.
Please, follow me, gentlemen.
Mr. Price is in the Oval Room.
-Your guests, Mr. Price. -Thanks, Angelo. Welcome. Sit down.
translation.zh: -普先生，访客到了 -谢谢，欢迎，请坐

translation.en: How is it with that Paki accountant I put your way?
translation.zh: 我安排的巴基斯坦会计师怎么样

translation.en: -He still doing the business? -Raj is doing a very good job.
translation.zh: -还在帮你的忙吗？ -拉吉得表现很出色

translation.en: Good. Paying your bit of straight-goer's tax, eh?
We all have to do our bit.
Say hello from me next time you see him.
You hungry? The grub here will make your bollocks tingle.
translation.zh: 饿吗？这里的食物好吃到不行

translation.en: Let's eat.
Right.
We've gotta test the "snap, crackle and pop" factor on these.
Don't ask me. I ain't fucking touching them.
You are a miserable bastard, you really are.
-Brian. -What?
Sit down, mate. Got a little treat for you.
Help yourself.
A little privacy, please, Angelo.
What do you want, son?
-Excuse me? -In life. What are you after?
translation.zh: -你说什么？ -你的人生在追求什么？

translation.en: A shot at the title? A seat by the band?
Well, I don't know, Mr. Price. That's a very expansive question.
translation.zh: 我不知道，这个问题很广

translation.en: Right, expansive. Good answer.
Years ago, people would've thought you were a homosexual...
...using a word like "expansive."
translation.zh: 别人会以为你是同性恋

translation.en: -You're not a homosexual, are you? -No.
-Not behind with the rent? -No.
No, I didn't think you were.
No harm in it, I suppose. Times change.
translation.zh: 这么说你不介意吧 毕竟时代变了

translation.en: You know why people like you can't leave this business?
translation.zh: 你这种人为何离不开这一行？

translation.en: Because you make too much money for people like me.
translation.zh: 因为你们帮我这种人赚太多钱了

translation.en: Anyway, I'll get to the point. I need a favor.
translation.zh: 我有话直说，我要你帮个忙

translation.en: I need someone who's a bit cute, a smooth operator.
translation.zh: 我需要一个帅气的熟手

translation.en: Not a two-a-penny loudmouth. Too many grasses around.
translation.zh: 而不是俗气又嚣张 旁边一堆啰喽的人

translation.en: -It would be a pleasure, Mr. Price. -Jimmy. You can call me Jimmy.
translation.zh: -这是我的荣幸，普先生 -叫我吉米就好

translation.en: Now, this favor. It's not for me, truth be told. It's for a good friend of mine.
translation.zh: 其实不是帮我的忙 是帮我的一个好友

translation.en: Like a blood brother. We were at school together.
translation.zh: 我们是同学，他就像我亲兄弟

translation.en: Now he's a right wheeler-dealer.
Flinging up skyscrapers. His wife's a proper blue blood.
translation.zh: 声势如日中天 他老婆可是正统的贵族

translation.en: I'll give you a clue. Eddie Temple.
Does that name mean anything to you?
-I know who you mean. -Now, Eddie's got a daughter.
translation.zh: -我知道你指的是谁 -艾迪有个女儿

translation.en: Charlie, bless her.
The light of his life. He worships the ground she walks on.
translation.zh: 是他的心肝宝贝，疼得不得了

translation.en: She's a proper beauty, Charlie.
Or to give her her correct moniker, Charlie Spencer-Temple.
translation.zh: 全名是夏丽史宾赛泰伯

translation.en: But she ain't behaving like a lady.
translation.zh: 可是她的行为不像淑女

translation.en: She's hooked on the white powder and loves a wrong one.
translation.zh: 她沾上了毒品，爱错了人

translation.en: This is where you come in, right? You're gonna find her.
translation.zh: 我们需要你把她找出来

translation.en: -Find her? -She's gone missing.
Well, you should get a private detective.
Oh, right. Some nosy ex-policeman, still on the Scotland Yard payroll?
translation.zh: 是喔，找个领退休金的警察？

translation.en: She's done a runner from a drug rehabilitation unit in the West Country.
Rehab.
She got loved up in there with some lowlife crackhead called Kinky.
translation.zh: 她在里面爱上一个毒虫阿基

translation.en: I reckon they've gone back to London.
I wouldn't know where to begin.
Now and then we're asked to do something beyond the call of duty.
translation.zh: 我们难免被人要求 做点份外的事

translation.en: It's called sacrifice, son.
Ask Gene. Ask Morty.
translation.zh: 问问金恩和莫提就知道

translation.en: -I'll do my best. -You do your best and find her.
Keep Mr. McGuire posted.
I've also got a little business more in your usual line.
translation.zh: 还有一点小生意要请你帮忙

translation.en: Gene will fill you in.
Everything was to your satisfaction?
-Fucking excellent, Angelo. -Thank you.
Details, details. Things to do, things to get done.
translation.zh: 〝细节，细节 要做什么，完成什么…

translation.en: Don't bother me with details. Just tell me when they're done.
translation.zh: 别拿鸡毛蒜皮来烦我 只要告诉我何时完成〞

translation.en: -Who said that, son? -Winston Churchill?
Close. No, I said it. James Lionel Price. Good boy.
translation.zh: 很接近，不对，我说的 普吉米，乖孩子

translation.en: I'll see you at the yard tomorrow. Say, 4:00.
Tell you about that bit of business. I've set up a meet for 5 with the Duke.
translation.zh: 关于那笔小生意 我跟公爵约了五点钟见面

translation.en: -What's with him? -He's just had one of these.
These are super Es. We'll make millions!
translation.zh: 这是强效摇头丸，我们要发了

translation.en: I don't care. This is my boatyard.
translation.zh: 我不管，这是我的船工厂

translation.en: I want those pills and that fucking idiot out of here now.
translation.zh: 把药丸和这个白痴弄出去

translation.en: -I can't afford to get nicked. -Paul. Calm down, mate.
I've got Gene coming down with a buyer. You'll be in your whack.
translation.zh: 金恩会带买家过来 会给你分红的

translation.en: Here, chill. Have a pill.
Gene, why are we doing business with the Duke?
translation.zh: 我们干嘛跟公爵做生意？

translation.en: Yeah, why are we dealing with this joker?
translation.zh: 对啊，干嘛跟那痞子做买卖？

translation.en: He's a fucking maniac, a relic, a throwback, belongs to the Dark Ages.
translation.zh: 他是疯子，古代人 该回黑暗时代去

translation.en: Will you just shut the fuck up?
We're dealing with him because he has 1 million Ecstasy pills...
...of very high levels of MDMA, okay?
translation.zh: 他有一百万颗高纯度摇头丸

translation.en: One million?
Gene, that is a lot of pills. What's the tax on that?
Jimmy wants 50 percent netto.
Love a bit of cloak-and-dagger, this lot.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这里的神秘气氛

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Driving a bright yellow Range Rover. Very subtle.
translation.zh: 是喔，开黄色路虎，真低调

translation.en: Calm down. You'll feel better once you've got your money.
translation.zh: 别激动 拿到钱你们就会舒坦点

translation.en: But how much can you spend in Parkhurst or the Scrubs, Gene?
Come on.
Oh, don't go getting Duke at it. Jimmy doesn't want him fucked about, okay?
translation.zh: 不要惹公爵，吉米不要他坏事

translation.en: Who? Me?
Don't you fucking talk to me like I'm some kind of mug.
Duke, don't take this personally. It's business.
You wanna know how much they're worth.
translation.zh: 你想知道它们价值多少

translation.en: Yes, fucking please!
Just because you pay a fiver a pop down the local cattle market...
translation.zh: 你在街头花五镑买一颗

translation.en: ...don't, for fuck's sake, think these pills are worth millions.
translation.zh: 不代表这些药丸价值数百万

translation.en: They're not.
We've gotta find a buyer.
They've gotta split them into parcels. They've gotta find these people.
translation.zh: 他们得分成小包装，找到人买

translation.en: You'd give a fucking aspirin a headache, pal.
translation.zh: 阿斯匹灵都会被你搞到头痛

translation.en: Then you've got currency fluctuations, police activity, adverse publicity.
translation.zh: 再加上币值变动、警方干扰 负面宣传

translation.en: Who has got the readies lying around to pay for a million Es?
translation.zh: 谁有现金买一百万颗摇头丸？

translation.en: -This is fucking bollocks! -Slasher, shut the fuck up!
-Duke, we all want a good deal. -Mate, mate, mate.
translation.zh: -我们都希望好好做笔生意 -老兄…

translation.en: Mate, look, that parcel of pills has got to be worth 5 million easy.
translation.zh: 那批货少说价值五百万

translation.en: -Five pound each, yeah! -You are fucking joking.
It doesn't work like that!
Don't keep fucking saying that to me!
translation.zh: 不要一直跟我说这句话

translation.en: I've got some samples. I'll stay in touch through Gene, okay?
translation.zh: 我有样品 会透过金恩跟你联络

translation.en: You wouldn't be so fucking flash if you didn't have him behind you.
translation.zh: 如果没有他罩你 你也不会这么嚣张

translation.en: Yeah, well, he fucking has, ain't he?
Where did these monkeys get a million Es?
translation.zh: 这些痞子怎么弄到一百万颗？

translation.en: Don't worry about that. Can you place them?
We know someone up north who'll buy.
translation.zh: 我知道北部有个人会买

translation.en: Morty, set up a meeting with Trevor and Shanks in Liverpool.
translation.zh: 莫提，安排跟崔佛和尚克 在利物浦碰面

translation.en: What's really bothering me is what color to get the Aston.
translation.zh: 比较麻烦的是挑什么颜色

translation.en: As you're driving it yourself, probably green.
translation.zh: 你自己开的话，应该挑绿色

translation.en: -Green? -Yeah.
That's a trifle dull, I thought. What do you think, girls?
translation.zh: 我觉得有点呆，你们说呢？

translation.en: Black. Yeah, black.
Black's the color for a hearse or a taxi.
translation.zh: 灵车或计程车才用黑色

translation.en: Don't be so conservative. Black's a splendid idea.
Hello. Look who it is. Sit down. Do join us.
translation.zh: 你好，看是谁来了 请坐，一块儿聊

translation.en: -Can we have a word? -Our dreary broker has arrived.
translation.zh: -我们可以说句话吗？ -讨厌的经纪人到了

translation.en: Hugo, follow me.
Don't go anywhere. Drink some more champagne.
Especially you. I like it when you're drunk.
translation.zh: 尤其是你 我喜欢你喝醉的样子

translation.en: -You're the master of that. -What are you up to?
We're doing the number on these American birds.
-Who am I today? -The Earl of Oxford.
-The Earl of Oxford. -Fucking hell.
-What's this business, then? -It's a bit strange.
Can you find somebody for me really quickly?
translation.zh: 你们能很快帮我找人吗？

translation.en: -How quickly? -Twenty grand quickly.
You've got our attention.
Oh, very nice. I suppose this is the boyfriend?
It's a bit unusual for you. What's going on?
translation.zh: 难得看你搞这种事，怎么了？

translation.en: -It doesn't matter. Can you do it? -Yeah.
Should be a doddle. All the same, junkies and crackheads.
translation.zh: 应该易如反掌，毒虫都一样

translation.en: Chuck them a few quid, they'll cough.
-Is there anything else? -No.
We must get back to work, old boy.
Look.
All right, mate. I'm the Duke's nephew.
Remember me? Sidney.
Sidney. Yes. Hello, mate. How are you? I'm just off. Have a nice night.
translation.zh: 西尼，你好吗？ 我要走了，晚安

translation.en: How you doing? What you doing here?
I hear you're doing business with my uncle, the Duke.
translation.zh: 听说你在跟我的公爵叔叔做生意

translation.en: Why don't you tell the whole fucking room?
translation.zh: 你干脆在这里广播算了

translation.en: -This is Tammy. -Who's your mate, Sidney?
He's a good mate of my uncle's, the Duke. He was just going.
translation.zh: 他是公爵叔叔的朋友，要走了

translation.en: Yeah, well, stick around and have a drink before you do, yeah?
-Yeah, all right. -I got VIP down here. Nice little booth.
Charisma, he's fucking got it.
I know he's my uncle and all that, but you can't deny it.
translation.zh: 我知道他是我叔叔 但你还是不能否认

translation.en: If you want anything, just tell me...
...because I got them straightened out in here.
If you want any running about, I'm your man....
-Line? -What?
I said do you want a line?
No, mate. You knock yourself out.
Lovely, isn't she? Isn't she a darling?
Isn't she?
Siddy, baby, I could do with a livener.
Ring me.
Sidney, it's been great. I'll see you, man. Thanks for the champagne.
translation.zh: 幸会了，回头见 谢谢你的香槟

translation.en: All right.
You let me know when you're happy, Mr. Lucky.
translation.zh: 等你高兴再通知我，来福先生

translation.en: -Too warm down your way? -We're kept busy, Trevor.
translation.zh: -你们人不嫌多吗？ -我们很忙，崔佛

translation.en: Everyone wants a slice as well.
Same wherever you go. Greedy people.
translation.zh: 你们到哪都一样 人们都贪得无厌

translation.en: Yeah, it's all clear, Shanks.
You lot would know all about that, wouldn't you?
What the fuck's that, Shanks?
Well, not you lot, but...
...that team down your end. Like you don't know.
No offense, but what the fuck are you talking about?
translation.zh: 恕我直言，你他妈的说什么？

translation.en: You really surprise me, do you know that?
Do you know something we don't?
translation.zh: 你知道什么我们不知道的事？

translation.en: Don't be giving it the big fucking innocent, pal.
Because I am not a fucking prick.
-I never said you were, Shanks. -Cool it. They really don't know.
translation.zh: -我没说你是 -别激动，他们真的不知道

translation.en: -Explain. -I was over in Amsterdam.
Last weekend, right?
The whole place is alight with a rumor...
...about how this hooligan outfit from down your end...
...run by this joker called the Duke....
translation.zh: 带头的是叫公爵的小丑

translation.en: Gazza, go and find them fucking pills.
All right. Come on. Have a look in here.
They skanked this outfit, a proper, nutty Serbian militia.
translation.zh: 他们惹上一批 疯狂的塞尔维亚部队

translation.en: You're the first person ever to be foolish enough to steal from me.
translation.zh: 你是第一个 笨到来偷我东西的人

translation.en: Shut up.
But you're not the first to point a gun at me.
translation.zh: 你不是第一个拿枪指着我的人

translation.en: Shut up or I'll be the last.
translation.zh: 再不闭嘴我就是最后一个

translation.en: Fuck me.
They got lucky. He'd just knocked up a massive batch.
translation.zh: 他们好狗运，发现一大批

translation.en: Fucking jackpot. There's fucking millions of the fuckers in here.
translation.zh: 中头彩了 里面有几百万颗

translation.en: Stay down there. Yes?
You watch them.
That looks very heavy for you, darling.
Fuck off.
-Why don't you put it down? -Why don't you shut up?
-A little girl playing games with guns. -I ain't no little girl. Shut up!
translation.zh: -小女生玩枪喔 -我不是小女生，闭嘴

translation.en: -You are shaking. -Fuck off!
-Look at your arm. -Fuck off!
-Put it down. -Why don't you listen to me?
-Sit down! -Fuck off!
Baby, baby, baby, baby!
Come here. Come here. Baby, calm down, calm down.
This will not be the end of this, Mr. Duke, believe me.
translation.zh: 相信我，事情绝对还没完

translation.en: Gazza, go and load them pills.
But he got unlucky because this lot are wanted for fucking war crimes.
translation.zh: 不过算他倒楣 这批人因战争罪遭通缉

translation.en: Mass murder, ethnic cleansing. They're lunatics.
translation.zh: 大屠杀，种族净化 他们是疯子

translation.en: They're wanted by the United-fucking-Nations.
translation.zh: 联合国在通缉他们 好好想想吧

translation.en: -Think about that. -Let's get this clear.
translation.zh: 联合国在通缉他们 好好想想吧 我们把话说清楚

translation.en: Duke has absolutely sweet fuck-all to do with us, understand?
translation.zh: 公爵跟我们一点屁关系也没有

translation.en: Everyone in Amsterdam believes that he has.
translation.zh: 阿姆斯特丹每个人都认为他有

translation.en: -Bandied your names about. -What?
translation.zh: -你们的名字被传来传去 -什么？

translation.en: Word on the straat is they've unleashed their top boy.
translation.zh: 据说他们派出最厉害的高手

translation.en: His name is....
Dragan?
They fucked us.
Find who's responsible and bring me his head.
His head!
His party piece, right...
...is lopping people's heads off then fetching them back to his boss.
translation.zh: 是砍掉人头再带去见老大

translation.en: It's all about honor and respect...
translation.zh: 这些凶残的民族主义份子

translation.en: ...with these head-banging nationalist outfits.
They can't have it getting about that anybody has took liberties with them.
translation.zh: 他们无法忍受太没礼貌的人

translation.en: But we had nothing to do with the acquiring of said merchandise.
Okay, we accept that.
But with you lot up here punting this shipment, how does it look?
translation.zh: 你们在这里卖货 难道不可疑吗？

translation.en: Bad.
You do know that we're only talking pennies an article?
translation.zh: 你们知道我们每颗有多少利润吗？

translation.en: -Stolen goods. -You won't want them, then.
translation.zh: -偷来的货 -那么你们不会想要的

translation.en: Sit down, lah. Let's not be too hasty.
Me and him need to have a little think.
Don't think too long. Someone's gonna make a killing on these pills.
translation.zh: 别想太久 有人要靠这些东西大捞一笔

translation.en: They already have. That's the problem, kidder.
translation.zh: 他们已经捞到了，那才是问题

translation.en: That prick Duke's made us look a bunch of fucking amateurs.
I told you he was trouble. But he ain't gonna drag me down with him.
translation.zh: 我早说过他是麻烦 我不会被他拖下水的

translation.en: Try Gene again. What a fucking show-up!
-He's not answering, Mort. -Okay.
Try Jimmy at home.
-You sure? -Will you fucking ring him?
-Where are we going, Morty? -Back to that boatyard.
Somebody's about to get a fucking slap.
Yes, Morty. About fucking time.
Paul?
What a way to go.
An iron burning a hole in your chest until your heart boils.
translation.zh: 熨斗把胸部烫到心脏起泡

translation.en: Paulie would've told him anything, then, wouldn't he?
You see, that's what happens when you do business with loons.
translation.zh: 跟无赖做生意就会这样

translation.en: Clarkie, have a sniff about. Make some phone calls, but really quietly.
translation.zh: 克拉奇，去找找看 打几通电话，但是要低调

translation.en: Find out where the Duke's holed up.
We're gonna need an insurance policy.
What's the idea of phoning me at home and leaving messages, prick!
translation.zh: 干嘛打电话到我家留话？

translation.en: -Jimmy, it was an emergency. -Don't fucking call me Jimmy!
translation.zh: -吉米，那是紧急状况 -不准叫我吉米

translation.en: And what's the idea of telling Duke those pills ain't worth shit?
translation.zh: 干嘛跟公爵说那些货不值钱？

translation.en: You don't know the problems you've caused.
And don't be leaving it to that pair of ponces, Cody and Tiptoes...
translation.zh: 不要叫那两个皮条客 柯迪和提托…

translation.en: ...to find that bitch Charlie.
I fucking told you to do it!
Are you listening? Find a buyer for those pills.
The person moving those pills met a nasty end.
I don't give a fuck!
-That was quick. -The gaff is rotten in there.
-Kinky's still here, isn't he? -Didn't Tiptoes tell you?
Tell me what? Have you let him go?
No, I haven't. He's in here.
Kinky.
I still wanna be paid.
So, if I'm correct, you three gearheads are gonna be clucking very soon.
translation.zh: 如果我没搞错 你们三个猪头很快就要完蛋了

translation.en: In fact, you're gonna be climbing the walls any minute, aren't you?
translation.zh: 你们随时都会爬墙，对吧？

translation.en: But I'm prepared to do you a favor.
We can do this one of two ways.
We can do it the nice way, which I think you'll prefer.
translation.zh: 我们可以用好的方法 我想你们也会比较喜欢

translation.en: Because the other way is my friend takes you...
...and puts your head through the window!
translation.zh: 我朋友把你们丢出窗外

translation.en: Right, so was Charlie here with Kinky?
translation.zh: 夏丽有跟阿基在这里吗？

translation.en: Yeah, she was here for a couple days. Kinky turned up with 5 grand.
translation.zh: 她在这里待过几天 阿基带了五千块过来

translation.en: -Who's giving Kinky 5 grand? -We don't know.
They kept arguing. She was saying, "Do you think it's that easy...
...taking the 5 grand?" But she was still caning the rocks.
translation.zh: 〝你以为五千那么好拿吗？〞 不过还是一直嗑药

translation.en: Where is she now?
Brighton. She kept begging Kinky to go with her.
translation.zh: 布莱登，她求阿基放她走

translation.en: The other night, I hears this noise. I'm looking out there. It's dark.
translation.zh: 前几天我听到声音 外面一片漆黑

translation.en: But I sees this geezer all in black. Like something out of a kung fu film.
translation.zh: 我看到那怪胎穿得一身黑 好像演功夫电影的

translation.en: -Pay no attention to him. He's a nutter. -Shut the fuck up.
translation.zh: -别听他的，他是疯子 -他妈的闭嘴

translation.en: And you, fucking tell him now. What geezer?
I don't know. I goofed out myself.
The next morning, she's gone and Kinky's dead.
translation.zh: 隔天早上她走了，阿基也挂了

translation.en: You're telling me that somebody's topped Kinky?
translation.zh: 你是说阿基被别人干掉？

translation.en: Kinky overdosed. He always was a greedy fucker.
I saw it with my own eyes, man.
You smoke too much of that fucking crack!
Shut the fuck up!
-You twat! -Shut the fuck up!
Get the fucking money!
Morty! Morty!
This is dodgy. That kid's talking about murder.
He's talking shit. Get to Brighton and finish the job.
translation.zh: 他在鬼扯 去布莱登把事情搞定

translation.en: -It all smells a bit fishy. -I'll double your money.
-All right. And 10 G for finding Kinky. -That wasn't the fucking deal.
translation.zh: -找到阿基要给一万 -这算哪门子行情？

translation.en: -Yes or no? -Yes.
Hello. Ambulance, please.
185 Kirby House, King's Cross.
translation.zh: 国王十字街科比大楼１８５号

translation.en: There's a dead boy. The door's open.
My name?
185 Kirby House.
I'm not happy.
This shit is out of control. You sort it out, or I'll sort you out.
translation.zh: 这件事一发不可收拾 你不解决我就把你解决掉

translation.en: Morty, Kinky OD'd, that's all.
translation.zh: 只是阿基吸毒过量而已

translation.en: Charlie woke up, found him cold, freaked out, fucked off to Brighton.
translation.zh: 夏丽醒来发现他全身冰冷 吓得跑到布莱登

translation.en: Cody's gonna find her.
Look, I'm gonna freshen these teas up. They're cold.
Morty?
Is that you?
Where you been hiding, then, eh?
Fucking hell. What you doing down this neck of the woods?
Hello, Freddie.
So...
...Mr. Mortimer.
Here, Morty, couldn't spare us a few quid, for old times' sake?
translation.zh: 看在过去的老交情 不能施舍几块钱吗？

translation.en: You look well flushed, bruv.
Fuck me, he's loaded.
Here, couldn't make it 5, could you...
...mate?
-Let's make it 10. -Yeah.
Ten's...
...a nice...
...round number.
What's the matter?
What's happening? Been away? Yeah. Ten fucking years.
Going off? Or do you need a red light?
translation.zh: 要挂了？还是需要救护车？

translation.en: Morty. Enough. He's had enough.
-I'll tell you when he's had enough. -What the fuck is this?
translation.zh: -我会告诉你他何时够惨 -怎么回事？

translation.en: But let's forget about all that.
Let's have a cup of tea, Mr. Hurst.
What the fuck?
I'm sorry about that. I won't be around for a while.
translation.zh: 不好意思，我要离开一阵子

translation.en: -It's me. -Hey.
Come on up. I'll leave the door open.
-How's your day been so far? -Very fucking funny.
Have you eaten? I'll have a Chinky sent up.
translation.zh: 吃过了吗？我来叫中国菜

translation.en: No, I'm fine, thank you.
Gene, who the fuck is Freddie?
He used to run with me, Morty and Jimmy in this real kamikaze firm.
translation.zh: 他以前跟我、莫提和吉米 待过一家心狠手辣的公司

translation.en: In those days, we were headed up by this guy called Crazy Larry.
translation.zh: 当时我们的头头叫疯拉里

translation.en: Yeah. Got shot, didn't he? Bit of a lunatic.
translation.zh: 他好像中过弹，有点疯狂

translation.en: That's an understatement. They were a spun-out bunch.
translation.zh: 这样说还算客气 他们是一群疯子

translation.en: Always doing loads of drugs.
Not worried about keeping a low profile.
I love you.
Turn over anyone who couldn't go to the law.
No fucking problem. Boys will be boys.
Until one of them, Kilburn Jerry...
translation.zh: 直到其中一个叫杰瑞的…

translation.en: ...shoots himself stone dead.
This is a bit of a dilemma.
This desperate posse can't call the law or an ambulance.
translation.zh: 他们不能报警或叫救护车

translation.en: Morty, out of some mad fucking sense of loyalty...
...actually volunteered to dispose of the body.
No head. But things went a bit wrong.
translation.zh: 无头，不过出了一点差错

translation.en: The guy Larry told to help him was Freddie Hurst.
The total imbecile had fallen asleep at some traffic lights...
...in a drunken, drug-induced stupor.
translation.zh: 这个蠢蛋在等红绿灯时睡着

translation.en: Morty was still shut up in the van with the headless body of Kilburn Jerry.
translation.zh: 莫提还跟杰瑞的无头尸体 关在箱型车里

translation.en: Being black was even worse than being Irish.
translation.zh: 身为黑人甚至比爱尔兰人还糟

translation.en: They threw the book at Morty.
Freddie got three years for aiding and abetting.
translation.zh: 佛莱迪因教唆与共犯被判三年

translation.en: Morty did 10 years because Freddie Hurst fell asleep?
translation.zh: 就因为佛莱迪睡着 莫提蹲了十年牢？

translation.en: But he kept his mouth shut.
Did his bird. Earned a lot of respect for that.
All because some kid was being ridden against his will...
-...by a psychotic lunatic. -Who?
translation.zh: -被一个疯子搞得精神错乱 -谁？

translation.en: But you, you fuck!
Larry.
-Crazy Larry was gay. -He was never gay.
translation.zh: -疯拉里是同志 -他从来就不是

translation.en: -Larry used to say.... -Fucking females is for puffs.
translation.zh: -拉里以前常说… -上女人是同志的专利

translation.en: So who shot Crazy Larry? A boyfriend?
translation.zh: 那是谁干掉疯拉里的？ 别人的男友吗？

translation.en: Probably.
Larry made enemies very easy. Took liberties with too many straight lads.
translation.zh: 拉里很容易树敌 跟太多异性恋男人随便乱来

translation.en: Not for me.
Listen, son. Let me explain something to you.
translation.zh: 听着，我解释一件事给你听

translation.en: Freddie's in intensive care with a bit of a brain hemorrhage.
translation.zh: 佛莱迪脑出血 待在加护病房里

translation.en: You were there at the scene. That's called joint venture.
Now, if Freddie dies, you're either in the dock with Morty...
translation.zh: 如果佛莱迪死了 你不是跟莫提坐在被告席

translation.en: ...or you're in the witness box putting him away. Think about that.
translation.zh: 就是坐在证人席指控他 好好想想吧

translation.en: You know, I will have one of those.
-All right, fellas? -Where's Duke?
-I don't know. -What do you mean?
-I don't know. I thought he was here. -Well, go and fucking find him.
translation.zh: -不知道，我以为他在这里 -去给我找他

translation.en: He's probably having a night out while us mugs babysit these.
translation.zh: 我们呆呆地看着这些东西 他八成跑去狂欢了

translation.en: Gene, what the fuck am I gonna do about these Serbs?
translation.zh: 这些塞尔维亚人怎么对付？

translation.en: Come here. I have something for you.
-You're gonna need one of these. -Fuck me, Gene.
I fucking hope not. Are you trying to scare the shit out of me?
translation.zh: 希望用不上，你想吓死我？

translation.en: I mean, I fucking hate guns.
Although that one is really pretty. Is that Second World War?
translation.zh: 不过这一把真漂亮 是二次大战的枪吗？

translation.en: Hey, point it upwards.
Oh, for fuck's sake.
Here, let me see if it's loaded.
You look like you could do that blindfolded.
translation.zh: 你好像闭着眼睛也会弄

translation.en: I can, and I do.
I find it very relaxing. Good for meditation.
translation.zh: 我觉得那样很放松，适合冥想

translation.en: Meditation is concentrating the front of the mind with a mundane task...
translation.zh: 冥想是把俗事集中在 脑袋的某部位

translation.en: ...so the rest of the mind can find peace.
translation.zh: 其他部位才能找到平静

translation.en: And you find peace with guns.
Well, on occasion. It has been known.
Listen. I know it's not your thing.
translation.zh: 听着，我知道这不是你的作风

translation.en: But if you ever have to kill somebody, never ever tell a living soul.
translation.zh: 但如果非杀人不可 千万别跟别人说

translation.en: -Who is this? -My name is Dragan.
How did you get this number?
Boatman Paul gave me your number, in the end.
translation.zh: 船夫保罗给我你的号码

translation.en: I believe you have some property that belongs to my employer...
translation.zh: 我想你有的东西是我老板的

translation.en: ...and you're the person I should talk to about the return of this cargo...
translation.zh: 你的伙伴公爵偷了那批货

translation.en: ...stolen by your associate, the Duke.
translation.zh: 我也该跟你谈怎么归还

translation.en: Dragan, the Duke is nothing to do with me.
Mr. Duke came to Amsterdam, used your name...
translation.zh: 公爵先生用你的名义 来到阿姆斯特丹

translation.en: ...said he worked for you.
-Are you listening? -Dragan...
...I've got an idea. Why don't you come round for breakfast?
translation.zh: 我有个想法，过来吃个早餐吧

translation.en: I'll squeeze some orange juice, and we'll talk about this like adults.
translation.zh: 我榨一些柳橙汁 我们认真地谈谈

translation.en: -How does that sound? -Sounds very hospitable.
-Do you know where I live? -No.
Well, fuck off, then.
Duke's gone missing. He's a fucking liability.
The pigs are everywhere. This was meant to be easy. No sweat.
translation.zh: 到处都是障碍 这件事本来很简单的

translation.en: Calm down, Gazza. I'm sure Duke's just fine.
translation.zh: 冷静点，加沙 我相信公爵不会有事的

translation.en: You've got 48 hours to find a buyer or I'm sending them back, okay?
translation.zh: 给你４８小时找买家 否则我把货送回去

translation.en: Now, listen. Don't do anything stupid, Gazza.
It ain't worth the grief. We've gone underground, off the radar.
translation.zh: 不值得，我们已经地下化了

translation.en: Nothing personal, but I don't trust you.
translation.zh: 我对你没成见，但我不信任你

translation.en: Listen, I just had a phone call from Gazza.
Being a cry-baby. Threatening to offload those pills in 48 hours.
translation.zh: 他在哎哎叫 威胁说两天后要卸货

translation.en: Between you and that gobshite Duke...
...he's promised Jimmy a bumper payday.
translation.zh: 找一天把你和公爵干掉

translation.en: -So get busy. -I said to Jimmy I'd try and--
translation.zh: -赶快行动 -我跟吉米说过我会想办法…

translation.en: He put yous together.
translation.zh: 他把你们两个看成一体

translation.en: You and Duke. That's his job.
translation.zh: 你和公爵，那是他的工作

translation.en: If you two can't make music, he's gonna want his whack out either way.
translation.zh: 你们两个再不行 他会想办法拿到自己那份

translation.en: That's business.
-I hope you put this Dragan straight. -Yeah. I told him to fuck off.
translation.zh: -希望你搞定龙哥了 -对，我叫他少惹我

translation.en: What? Please tell me you're fucking joking.
Well, I am beginning to regret it now.
We've gotta find the Duke, find these fucking pills.
We can't rely on these monkeys to call Gene.
translation.zh: 不能奢望那些人打给金恩

translation.en: We've looked everywhere. There's no sign.
You can't find any of his firm?
Maybe this Dragan geezer's already found the Duke...
translation.zh: 也许龙哥已经找到公爵

translation.en: ...and done the business.
Yeah, well, there is someone I can call. Keep looking.
translation.zh: 我可以跟某人联络看看 你们继续找

translation.en: Wait. You're gonna leave it to us?
This Dragan geezer is phoning me. I am the target.
translation.zh: 龙哥打给我，我成了目标

translation.en: And if we don't find the Duke, this, everything, all over.
translation.zh: 不找到公爵，一切就完了

translation.en: -It's me. Sidney's mate. -Oh, hiya.
-What took you so long to call? -I've been busy.
-You sound sleepy. Just woken up? -Not long ago.
translation.zh: -你听起来有点困，刚睡醒？ -醒没多久

translation.en: -So when am I gonna see you? -What are you doing now?
Nothing. No, I was just lying in bed, wondering what to do.
translation.zh: 没什么 我躺在床上想该做什么

translation.en: -You still in bed? -Yeah.
You lying there naked?
I've got a little T-shirt on. But that's all.
Here, wait, listen to this.
What's that?
I was just rubbing the phone against my fanny.
Did you like it? My, oh, my, it's fresh this morning.
translation.zh: 喜欢吗？ 天啊，今天早上真清爽

translation.en: Look at my nipples, standing up like little soldiers. What is a girl to do?
translation.zh: 我的乳头硬得好坚挺 这时女生该怎么办呢？

translation.en: Tammy, why don't we meet up now?
translation.zh: 谭米，我们现在就见面吧

translation.en: I'll book a table for lunch. St. Martin's Hotel.
translation.zh: 我预约圣马丁饭店的午餐

translation.en: Don't worry about a table. We'll have room service.
translation.zh: 别预约了，我们叫客房服务

translation.en: -Yeah, okay. -One hour.
Hang on.
Oh, shit.
Oh, leave it off, Sidney. He's driving me fucking mad.
translation.zh: 不管了，西尼快把我逼疯了

translation.en: -We're not expecting Sidney, are we? -He's too busy kissing Duke's arse.
translation.zh: -我们不是在等西尼吧？ -他忙着拍公爵的马屁

translation.en: Not round here, I hope.
No, over by Greenwich market. So you can relax. It's just the two of us.
translation.zh: 不，在格林威治市场 别紧张，只有我们两个

translation.en: Patience. All good things come to those who wait.
Stay put.
Come on.
Hello, it's me. It's me. Shut up and listen.
Duke's nephew is working down by Greenwich Market. Go and look.
translation.zh: 公爵的侄子在格林威治市场工作 过去看看

translation.en: -Room service. -Look for that yellow Range Rover.
Okay.
-Your champagne, sir. -I didn't order--
One moment, Mr. Troop.
I want to hear what this bastard has to say for himself.
translation.zh: 我想听听这混蛋有什么话好说

translation.en: I'm Jimmy's old colleague, Eddie Temple.
translation.zh: 我是吉米的老同事艾迪泰伯

translation.en: -Fuck! -He told you to locate my daughter.
Hunt her down like some lost mongrel.
He said you asked for his help.
Mr. Troop could find anyone on the planet in 10 minutes flat.
translation.zh: 部队先生十分钟内 就能找到任何人

translation.en: If you'd laid a finger on my daughter, you'd be over the edge like that.
translation.zh: 敢碰我女儿一根寒毛 你就会一命呜呼

translation.en: You'd join that shit, Kinky...
...who thought he could take my 5 grand and fuck me over.
translation.zh: 他以为拿能五千块落跑

translation.en: The audacity. How fucking dare you?
I've known Jimmy Price for 45 years.
It pays me to keep an eye on him.
Do you know what a remora fish is?
-Yes. -Oh, you do?
Well, Jimmy has been swimming in my slipstream all my fucking life.
translation.zh: 吉米一辈子跟在我后面

translation.en: I thought he might put some volatile psychopath on the job.
translation.zh: 我以为他可能找个神经病 干这件事

translation.en: But I've checked you out, son. You're a smart boy.
But you keep very, very bad company.
translation.zh: 可是却交了很坏的朋友

translation.en: You know, I host a charity golf tournament every year.
translation.zh: 我每年都办慈善高尔夫球赛

translation.en: Quite an event in the social calendar, if I do say so myself.
I like to invite Jimmy. Some of my friends find him absurdly hilarious.
translation.zh: 我喜欢邀请吉米 有的朋友觉得他很滑稽

translation.en: Drinks are on me. Drinks for everyone.
Champagne. Fucking good gear and all.
But I've come unstuck in my attempts to provide a spectacle for my chums.
translation.zh: 我已不太想让朋友刮目相看

translation.en: Jimmy, as usual on the lookout for tidbits...
translation.zh: 吉米却一如往常找事做

translation.en: ...has met the development minister of some tin-pot republic.
translation.zh: 见了某个小国的开发部长

translation.en: They're trawling the West for investments.
translation.zh: 他们想吸引西方前往投资

translation.en: They have vast natural resources. Quite an investment for the right man.
translation.zh: 他们有庞大的自然资源 是一项很大的投资 （黄金，锌，钻石）

translation.en: They've sent in men from Timbuktu explaining all the details.
Profits, shares, long-term investments, short-term investments.
translation.zh: 红利，股份 长期投资，短期投资

translation.en: They've even made him an honorary citizen.
translation.zh: 他甚至还被封为荣誉市民

translation.en: Even made him one of the tribe.
What we didn't know, until it all ended in tears...
...was that the hardline communist insurgents...
translation.zh: 那个国家矿区以外的地区

translation.en: ...who control the country outside the mining areas....
translation.zh: 是由强硬的共党份子控制

translation.en: Bad news about our little venture, Jim. The communists have broken through.
translation.zh: 我们的合资生意有坏消息 共产党闯进来了

translation.en: Heading for the capital with little resistance.
translation.zh: 他们往首都前进 没遭到什么反抗

translation.en: What the fuck are you on about?
I got word they were planning a push.
translation.zh: 听说他们打算采取攻击

translation.en: The final coup de grâce. I told Jimmy.
-It's all over. -Fuck's sake!
-Keep your voice down. -Get my money out quick, now.
translation.zh: -小声一点 -快把我的钱拿出来

translation.en: As if it was some little kiddie's piggy bank.
I explained that wasn't possible. We thought we'd bought a government.
translation.zh: 我解释过那不可能 我们以为能买下一个政府

translation.en: Maybe someone made a better offer. Forget about it.
translation.zh: 也许有人提出更好的条件 算了

translation.en: You win some, you lose some.
How much are we talking?
It's only a cheeky half-mil, Jim.
-It's much more than that. -How much?
-Thirteen. -Thirteen what?
-Thirteen million pounds. I'm fucked. -Have you gone fucking mad?
translation.zh: -一千三百万英镑，我惨了 -你疯了吗？

translation.en: Thirteen million pounds!
How could you be so fucking stupid?
You've been right grafted, royally turned over.
translation.zh: 你赚取不义之财，咸鱼翻身

translation.en: Like some Yank buying London Bridge.
Don't talk to me like that.
He accused me of instigating it.
It's no coincidence I met them at your tournament.
translation.zh: 我在你的比赛中见到他们 并非巧合

translation.en: Are you fucking demented?
Asked me to fly to Zurich to see the minister...
translation.zh: 他要我飞到苏黎世去见部长

translation.en: ...still parked up in La Maison Grande, still eating well.
translation.zh: 对方还在豪宅里吃喝享受

translation.en: Big fat fucker. On little Jimmy's nest egg.
Jimmy thought he'd keep Charlotte hostage...
...while you went to get his money.
Little Jimmy was so stupid, he thought he couldn't lose either way.
translation.zh: 吉米真笨，以为两边都不落空

translation.en: I'm sorry, what?
If you find Charlotte, he's got his hostage.
translation.zh: 你找到夏丽，他就有人质

translation.en: If I find you trying to find her, I do his dirty work.
translation.zh: 我发现你想找她 就会帮他去要钱

translation.en: -I'm still not with you. -Your lives are inextricably linked.
translation.zh: -我还是听不懂 -你们的命运相连

translation.en: I've found out something very interesting about Jimmy...
translation.zh: 我发现吉米一件有趣的事情

translation.en: ...something I've long suspected.
But I'll let Jimmy explain.
You follow me.
You've no doubt suffered...
translation.zh: 你一定常听吉米碎碎念

translation.en: ...Jimmy's "CID was geezers you was at school with" routine?
translation.zh: 说刑事调查局的人 就像学校的怪胎

translation.en: The other chap's Albert Carter.
Another twisted bastard from the old neighborhood.
Member of the Regional Crime Squad. Sit back, relax, enjoy.
translation.zh: 地区刑事组的成员 放轻松好好地听

translation.en: It ain't like your lot in the old days.
-They've all gone squeaky. -Tell me about it, Jim.
I have to box clever with those college boys from Anti-Corruption.
translation.zh: 我得应付反贪污小组的 那些大学男生

translation.en: -Fucking dogs. Slags. Ten grand? -That's the going rate, Jim.
translation.zh: -真是一群狗，一万吗？ -那是现在的行情

translation.en: Ten K. Hardly seems worth the bother.
Well, there's only so much in those informer funds.
What about Gene? Does he suspect anything?
translation.zh: 金恩呢？他有怀疑什么吗？

translation.en: What? About me working for the old firm? Listen. Gene...
translation.zh: 怀疑我帮旧公司工作吗？

translation.en: ...is too loyal for his own good.
-I don't fucking believe it. -You better believe it.
-Because it's fucking happening. -Where did you get this?
translation.zh: -因为就是发生了 -你从哪弄来的？

translation.en: Mr. Troop made it for me.
-It's one of his little hobbies. -I don't fucking believe it.
translation.zh: -这是他小小的嗜好 -我不相信

translation.en: Don't you wanna hear what Jimmy has to say about you?
translation.zh: 你不想听吉米说你什么吗？

translation.en: I've got one for you. Plucked and ready for the pot.
translation.zh: 我有一个人选 随时可以用

translation.en: -Just give us a name, and he's gone. -In time.
translation.zh: -说出名字，他就死定了 -会的啦

translation.en: I don't want a bunce. I want him out of the way.
translation.zh: 不要干掉他 别让他碍事就好

translation.en: Flash young runt. One of the new breed, ain't he?
Reckons he can just waltz off into retirement.
translation.zh: 他自以为可以顺利退出

translation.en: I want him away for 12.
If he's got a kilo of class A, he's looking at double figures.
translation.zh: 如果他拿到一公斤A级货 就会坐个十几年牢

translation.en: -I'll put it there myself. -Sounds personal.
translation.zh: -我会亲自动手 -好像跟你很亲密

translation.en: He's got a few quid. He'll come in handy.
translation.zh: 他有一点钱，会派得上用场

translation.en: I set him up with that slippery accountant in the first place.
translation.zh: 我先找会计师去设计他

translation.en: Fucking rag-head let slip, didn't he?
"You will miss him when he's gone, Mr. Price."
Is that you, the flash runt who thinks he's retiring?
translation.zh: 想退休的青年才俊是你吗？

translation.en: You'd no idea what Jimmy was up to?
translation.zh: 你不知道吉米在干什么？

translation.en: How do you think these fuckers earn a living?
translation.zh: 你想这些痞子靠什么过活？

translation.en: I would've thought a smart young man like you would know that already.
translation.zh: 我以为你这么聪明的年轻人 早就知道了

translation.en: -Can I have that? -Mr. Troop.
Thank you.
This looks like you, son. Smart part of town.
I'll keep an eye open. Must dash off. Get home. Wash and brush up.
translation.zh: 我会随时注意的 该回家梳洗一番了

translation.en: Opera tonight. The Damnation of Faust.
translation.zh: 今晚的歌剧 《士德的天谴》

translation.en: Man sells his soul to the devil. All ends in tears.
translation.zh: 一个人把灵魂卖给魔鬼 悲剧收场

translation.en: These arrangements usually do.
One more thing, young man.
Always remember, the art of good business is being a good middleman.
translation.zh: 切记，好生意的艺术 在于当个好的中间人

translation.en: Bye-bye.
Fuck!
-I've got him. -Got who?
Sidney, remember? Yellow Range Rover?
Seems they sent our friend out for something to eat.
translation.zh: 他们好像派我们朋友去买东西吃

translation.en: Good. Tell Morty.
-So, what do we do now? -Call Morty.
Shut up and listen. No more insults, no more games.
translation.zh: 闭嘴听好，不要再耍花样

translation.en: If I do not get my cargo back, you're a dead man.
translation.zh: 货拿不回来你就死定了

translation.en: Dragan, I've been doing some checking.
-I've found out who you represent. -Good.
I can point you towards your boss's merchandise.
translation.zh: 我可以告诉你 去哪里找老板的货

translation.en: -Come to my hotel-- -Look...
...I'd rather meet you in a public place.
translation.zh: 我希望在公共场所碰面

translation.en: You have nothing to fear. I'm a reasonable man.
translation.zh: 没什么好怕的，我很讲道理

translation.en: That's not what I've heard.
I'll meet you at....
I'll meet you at Greenwich Park Observatory.
translation.zh: 格林威治公园观景台碰面

translation.en: -Any taxi will drop you off. -I can read a map.
translation.zh: -搭计程车就能到 -我可以看地图

translation.en: -Tomorrow. Midday. -Tomorrow at 12.
I'll be there.
That's rude, Mr. Dragan.
Condition's red down there, pal.
They're didgy as fuck. They haven't moved from that lockup.
Have a look at the geezer at the front, on the door.
I know him from somewhere. This could get messy.
What about the blokes in red?
Mechanics. They got a ringing coup going on.
The lorries come in one color, go out another.
But they're nothing to do with the Duke.
-Fuck me, look who it isn't. -Who's that?
It doesn't matter. I've got work to do.
-Stay here. Those pills move, call me. -You got it.
translation.zh: -别跑，有动静就通知我 -没问题

translation.en: -Day and night, Terry. -What do you mean "night"?
-I've been here all day. Get Clarkie. -Day and fucking night. Got it?
translation.zh: -我整天都在这里，找克拉奇 -日夜都待着，懂吗？

translation.en: Hello, young man. Thank you for coming at such short notice.
I hope you didn't feel too summoned. How are you?
translation.zh: 希望你不觉得太无理 你好吗？

translation.en: I'm in the best of health, Mr. Temple. Thank you for asking.
translation.zh: 我的健康好得很，谢谢关心

translation.en: -How are you keeping? -I'm very well.
-How was the performance of Faust? -Complex.
No wonder it took him 60 years to write it.
How's the family?
What is this? A vicar's tea party?
You do sometimes take your conversations away with you.
Being a clever bastard, are we?
-How do I know you're not wired up? -Well, I'm not.
translation.zh: -我哪知道你没带家伙？ -我没有

translation.en: Then we'll have to trust each other, won't we? Sit down.
translation.zh: 那我们得信任对方，请坐

translation.en: I've been thinking, after our chat the other day.
Your pills. How much for the lot?
No, I've already got a buyer.
Nearly took my hand off. He's putting the money together now.
translation.zh: 差不多要脱手了，他在筹钱

translation.en: I told you, lah. I'm still thinking.
It's only been three days. What's the fucking hurry?
-What's he paying? -It's confidential.
Don't be an idiot. Let me match his offer.
They've got history.
Bad juju.
And, anyway, this Serbian maniac's in hot pursuit.
translation.zh: 而且那个塞尔维亚疯子很急

translation.en: If I sold them to you, I'd have to disappoint him. And he is definitely--
translation.zh: 我卖给你会让他失望 而他肯定…

translation.en: I did you a big fucking favor letting you know about Jimmy.
translation.zh: 我帮了你一个大忙 让你知道吉米的状况

translation.en: I think you owe me.
Two and a half million in sterling and euros, high-denomination used notes.
translation.zh: ２５０万的英币和欧元 高面值的旧钞

translation.en: So if I gave you 3 million, that would keep everyone happy.
translation.zh: 如果给你三百万，大家都开心

translation.en: Let me state my position.
You can sell these pills to whoever you like.
That's your privilege. That's your business.
translation.zh: 那是你的权利，你家的事

translation.en: But I'll tell you...
...I'll be very, very unhappy if you don't sell them to me.
translation.zh: 如果你不卖给我 我会非常不爽

translation.en: You understand?
Okay, Mr. Temple. Three million. Done.
-My buyer's not gonna be happy. -Fuck him. He'll get over it.
translation.zh: -我的买家会很不高兴 -去他的，他会释怀的

translation.en: I'm gonna need some help.
Someone who can eliminate the problem. Someone who's a bit handy.
translation.zh: 一个可以解决问题的人

translation.en: Whoa! Slow down, kidder.
Mr. Lucky does a drop of freelance work.
translation.zh: 来福先生是个自由工作者

translation.en: I don't need to know. It's none of my business.
translation.zh: 我不必知道，不关我的事

translation.en: You tell him when, and he'll come down on the train.
translation.zh: 跟他说时间，他会搭火车来

translation.en: Thanks, Trev.
Excuse me.
Mr. Temple.
You deliver them to my warehouse. When do I get my consignment?
translation.zh: 把货送到我的仓库 何时可以收到？

translation.en: Monday. No, Tuesday, probably.
Tuesday? I'm paying over the odds, remember?
translation.zh: 星期二？ 我已经出高价了，记得吗？

translation.en: England! Typical. Even drug dealers don't work weekends.
translation.zh: 英格兰，真是的 连毒贩都周休二日

translation.en: That's good news. That should cheer Gene up.
translation.zh: 那是好消息，金恩应该会开心

translation.en: Yeah, everything's under control.
-Cody's been chasing his 10 grand. -Yeah. I'll call him later.
translation.zh: -柯迪在追讨他的一万块 -我会打给他

translation.en: -Hey, Geno, what's up? -Got some good news.
Oh, yeah? What's that?
-You murdering bastard! -Open the fucking door!
-Stay out of this, Morty. -Gene!
-Murder? Who's dead? -Jimmy.
He killed him. Blew his fucking head away.
translation.zh: 是他干的，他轰掉他的脑袋

translation.en: -Open the fucking door! -Why?
Open the fucking door!
-Get off him. -No, listen, listen. Just listen.
Listen to me, Morty. I got a call from a cozzer we've got bent.
translation.zh: 听我说，我接到警察的电话

translation.en: They found Jimmy's body last night.
translation.zh: 他们昨晚发现吉米的尸体

translation.en: In his own backyard. It was this sly bastard.
translation.zh: 陈尸在他家后院 是这个奸诈的混蛋干的

translation.en: He's no killer. Somebody's made a mistake.
translation.zh: 他不是凶手，有人搞错了

translation.en: All right, look. Here. We'll see.
Read it. Read it out loud.
"To senior ranks only. Murder Squad investigation. James Lionel Price."
translation.zh: 〝限资深警员收 凶杀组，普吉米…〞

translation.en: Read the fucking ballistics report.
"Preliminary ballistics report. No arms recovered. Disintegrated on impact.
One recovered cartridge casing."
You forgot to take the cartridge case. You got sloppy.
translation.zh: 你忘了捡弹壳，粗心大意

translation.en: "--consistent with weapon used...
...in unsolved homicide of Lawrence Gower a.k.a. Crazy Larry Flynn."
Wait. I got it. Whoever killed Crazy Larry must've killed Jimmy.
translation.zh: 等等，我知道了 杀吉米和疯拉里的是同一个人

translation.en: No, no. The gun. The fucking gun was the same.
The one he stole from my flat.
-You killed Crazy Larry? -So?
-This fucker killed Jimmy. -Oh, Jesus Christ!
-Why did you do it? -He was an informer.
He was a police informer!
Jimmy a grass? Are you fucking mad?
-You'll have to do better than that. -I've got a recording at home.
translation.zh: -挑个好一点的借口 -我家里有录音

translation.en: Of Jimmy and a cozzer called Albie Carter.
translation.zh: 吉米和一个叫卡特的条子

translation.en: Gene, let's listen to this shit.
If he's lying, we'll both fucking kill him.
Mr. Mortimer reckons...
...the Tylers are bringing in shooters from Jamaica via Manchester.
translation.zh: 泰勒家族会从牙买加找枪手

translation.en: They got someone in Immigration straightened out.
translation.zh: 他们在移民局有人接应

translation.en: I don't think anybody gives a fuck about spades shooting spades.
translation.zh: 黑人枪杀黑人没人会在意的

translation.en: Don't you care about dead darkies, Albert?
What about Gene? Does he suspect anything?
translation.zh: 金恩呢？他有怀疑什么吗？

translation.en: What? About me working for the old firm?
Convinced?
You don't fuck about, do you?
Jimmy was skint, huh?
That's why he set up the whole Amsterdam business with Duke.
translation.zh: 所以他跟公爵建立了 阿姆斯特丹的生意

translation.en: I really think we should keep all of this to ourselves, right?
translation.zh: 我们不该透露出去，对吧？

translation.en: Really?
Why did you kill Larry?
Funny enough, it was Jimmy who persuaded me.
Jimmy never liked Larry.
Look at that wrong one waving his money around. It ain't right.
translation.zh: 那家伙拿钱乱张扬，不对

translation.en: Hey, I love you, man.
He saw the future was drugs and it needed to be run like a business.
translation.zh: 他认为毒品有前景 需要当事业好好经营

translation.en: Crazy Larry was no fucking businessman.
translation.zh: 疯拉里根本不会作生意

translation.en: After that business with Kilburn Jerry...
That's it, son. You do him. Bollocks!
...he wanted him gone.
I didn't have any problem doing him.
That's why I did it.
But why did you keep the gun?
Sounds silly now, but it was me favorite.
translation.zh: 听起来很蠢，但它是我的最爱

translation.en: I hope you don't tell the other guns you've got favorites.
translation.zh: 希望你没告诉别的枪你有最爱

translation.en: So, what's the next move, boss?
Well, I'm going to bed.
I don't know what you two are doing. We can talk about it tomorrow.
translation.zh: 不知道你们在干嘛 我们可以明天再谈

translation.en: Sorry?
Sorry, mate, what was that?
Would you pack that in? I've got a fucking test next week.
Okay. Okay, I'm sorry. I was just saying....
So when does the target get here, then?
The target? The target's gonna be here at exactly midday.
-Where? -Here, right fucking here.
Got a photo?
-Don't worry about it. -Who's worried?
I'll have some binoculars. I'll give you a little signal.
translation.zh: 我会拿望远镜，给你暗号

translation.en: I could get the 10 past 1 home from here.
Let's have a little recce.
After we do the business, walk slowly back.
translation.zh: 事情办完后，慢慢走回来

translation.en: Remember, it's a stroll in the park.
Don't run, whatever you do.
The first five minutes, nobody'll have a clue what's going on.
translation.zh: 前五分钟 不会有人知道怎么回事

translation.en: Hopefully, it'll be mayhem.
So try to stay relaxed.
Don't do anything to draw attention to yourself.
Or me.
Afterwards, take me to the Underground station.
I'll look after myself.
There.
Time?
Six minutes to 12.
I hope he's not gonna be late.
-Maybe he'll be early. -That'd be nice.
Can you see that guy on the left?
-Big fella, marching up the hill. -That's our man.
-Are you sure? -For fuck's sake. I'm gonna call him.
It's up to you. You're the client.
As soon as he answers, he's gone, okay?
Okey-dokey.
Stand by.
Now.
Hello, may I help you?
Don't move a muscle.
-Do I have your attention? -Yes.
You English, you have no idea of honor and respect.
translation.zh: 你们英格兰人 完全不懂荣誉与尊重

translation.en: I usually kill for less. I want my cargo and the Duke.
translation.zh: 我通常要求没这么多 我要货和公爵

translation.en: I haven't got your pills. Just give me a day.
translation.zh: 我还没拿到货 给我一天时间

translation.en: Don't piss in my pocket and tell me it's raining.
Now listen for the last time.
-You'll bring me what is mine. -Look, I don't-- Jesus!
translation.zh: -把我的东西带来 -我没有…天啊！

translation.en: You have one more day.
See you tomorrow at dusk by the statue.
Remember, I will be watching you.
What the fuck were you thinking?
Getting Trevor's man down here to shoot this Serb in a park!
translation.zh: 叫崔佛的人来射杀 公园的塞尔维亚人

translation.en: Trevor's gonna go ballistic. Now, what the fuck do I tell him?
translation.zh: 崔佛会失去理智 我要跟他说什么？

translation.en: -What a fucking mess. -You've gone mad.
-Think you're a gangster? -Fuck off!
You wanna play? You do it somewhere else.
If you do it near me, I'll put you in a fucking wheelchair.
translation.zh: 否则我让你残废坐轮椅

translation.en: Stick to your fucking sums.
Listen. Listen to me.
Dragan's killed Paul. He's done the Duke.
translation.zh: 龙哥干掉了保罗和公爵

translation.en: He's just put a bullet between Lucky's eyes. I was there!
translation.zh: 来福眉心中弹，我亲眼目睹

translation.en: He's watching our every move. Who's next, me?
translation.zh: 他盯着我们的每一步 下个是谁，我吗？

translation.en: -I wish. -Fuck off! Could be you or Morty.
Dragan said he wanted the pills and the Duke. Where's the Duke?
translation.zh: 龙哥说他要货和公爵 公爵在哪？

translation.en: What?
I should've told you this earlier.
Duke and Slasher came by the office the other day.
translation.zh: 公爵和小刀前几天到办公室

translation.en: Paul the boatman was topped last night.
I've gotta get on my toes sharpish.
I want Jimmy brought here right now, yeah?
Getting that smug yuppie bastard to tell Duke those pills were useless...
translation.zh: 叫那雅痞告诉公爵 先送我们过来

translation.en: ...after sending us over in the first place.
Hang on, you've lost me now.
translation.zh: 等等，你们把我搞糊涂了

translation.en: If you have us over, I swear by fucking almighty God, I'll call the fucking law.
translation.zh: 你敢整我们，我绝对报警

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -I'll call the law.
She didn't mean that. She's upset.
Shut the fuck up!
That's where playing at being a gangster gets you.
You're not in there because I like you.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你，你才不在里面

translation.en: I'm beginning to feel left out.
Why?
Freddie Hurst is still in intensive care...
...after your jolly little reunion the other day.
Fucking hell, Duke.
For once, you might be of some use.
translation.zh: 你本来可能有点用处的

translation.en: That was Gazza on the phone. It's on.
He'll pick you up at 9 in the morning. Gallows Corner. Know it?
translation.zh: 他早上９点会去接你 知道盖洛斯街角吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
With Jimmy gone, these pills will make a nice contribution...
translation.zh: 既然吉米挂了 那些货可以给我多点退休金恩

translation.en: ...to my retirement fund, so don't fuck things up again, okay?
If you do...
...you'll wish this Dragan had shot you between the eyes, understand?
translation.zh: 你会宁可让龙哥射中眉心 懂吗？

translation.en: Best of luck.
Thanks.
Fuck off!
Sidney, I've told you, stop answering my phone, okay?
translation.zh: 西尼，我说过不要接我的电话

translation.en: -Who was it? -Wrong number.
-What's up, mate? -Hello, Sidney.
-How you doing, then? -I'm all right. How are you?
I'm all right, mate, yeah.
Gazza, this place stinks. We want to get you out of here. Fifty pence a pill.
translation.zh: 加沙，这里真烂 我们让你离开，一颗５０便士

translation.en: That way, we all come out with something.
-I think they're worth more than that. -This is a reality check.
translation.zh: -它们价值不只如此 -拜托，实际一点

translation.en: Paul's dead, Jimmy's dead. Duke and Slasher, fuck knows where they are.
translation.zh: 保罗死了，吉米死了 公爵和小刀不知去向

translation.en: This gear is knock-off, and the Serbs you nicked it from...
translation.zh: 这批是假货 被你们骗的塞尔维亚人…

translation.en: ...they'd kill you like you'd take a piss.
Gazza, the old bill are outside!
-Gazza, no! -Go, go, go!
-Let's have it! -Don't point that gun at me.
-Put it down! -We're going in!
Gazza, look at me. Put it down. You're gonna get us all shot.
translation.zh: 加沙，看着我，枪放下 你会害我们没命

translation.en: Fuck it! Boat!
Stay there!
Fuck!
Come on!
-Gazza, wait! -Fucking hurry up, then!
Get in.
Is this for me?
Yes.
Your cargo's gone, I'm afraid.
-It was seized by-- -I know already.
-How do you know? -I watched.
I don't believe this. Cox's gonna go fucking spare!
We are in shit. You lot have fucked up again.
translation.zh: 我们惨了，你们又搞砸了

translation.en: Oh, fucking hell.
Leave it to me, lads. I'll explain to Inspector Cox...
...that his suspect has scarpered because of your blundering.
translation.zh: 他的嫌犯因你们的卤莽而逃走

translation.en: Knobheads. Helmets off.
Does this settle things, then?
Tango Foxtrot, over.
Delta Uniform.
How did that other errand go?
translation.zh: 另一项任务进行得如何？

translation.en: Success, as far as I could make out.
Where is my fucking prisoner?
-You old ladies couldn't catch a cold. -Sir, I just--
translation.zh: -你们这些老太婆成事不足 -长官，我…

translation.en: Shut up, you soppy wanker.
-Go. -Dingo Bongo.
-Is this area now secure? -Yes, sir.
You can fuck off, then.
So where are the pills, genius?
I think this is them now.
What the fuck?
-Couldn't leave this behind. -Greenies.
You are in the wrong game. You should work with us.
translation.zh: 你入错行了，应该加入我们

translation.en: -Are we square? -Yeah, we're sweet.
It seems so. Your pills are in the back. Help yourself.
translation.zh: 看来是，你的货在后面 自己动手

translation.en: Hello.
Okay. Yes, it will do. Bye-bye.
You're off the hook, Morty. Freddie Hurst is out of his coma.
translation.zh: 你脱身了，莫提 佛莱迪清醒了

translation.en: Good news.
-Yeah. -Good news, mate.
Listen, I've got one for you.
Irishman caught his son snorting charlie.
translation.zh: 爱尔兰佬逮到儿子嗑药

translation.en: He said, "If I catch you doing that again, I'll rub your fucking nose in it."
translation.zh: 他说〝再给我逮到 我就把你鼻子塞进去〞

translation.en: -Do you have the pills? -In the cars.
Boss wants to see you in his office.
Come in. Sit down.
Here you are. Payment.
-You look shocked, son. -Are you taking the fucking piss?
You and Jimmy have caused my little angel Charlotte considerable anxiety.
translation.zh: 你和吉米 让我女儿夏丽严重焦虑

translation.en: She's off to Arizona for a course of intense treatment.
translation.zh: 她到亚利桑那做密集治疗

translation.en: I'm keeping those pills for myself, by way of compensation.
translation.zh: 我要保留那些货作为补偿

translation.en: I think I'm entitled. Simple. End of.
The amount of trouble you've caused the last few days.
Jimmy.
Poor little Jimmy.
It would be in your interests...
...if this thing finishes here, now, today. Understand?
It doesn't matter what I do. This lot are gonna come after you.
translation.zh: 我做什么不重要 那批人会追你

translation.en: They're too long in the tooth to rampage round the country...
...looking for revenge. Look at them.
Bunch of underendowed, aging fuck-pigs.
Are you enjoying this?
No. On the contrary. Take it as a compliment.
translation.zh: 不，正好相反 就当作是赞美吧

translation.en: You're a bright young man.
This monkey business is in your blood, under your skin.
You're not getting out, you're just getting in. I've every faith in you.
translation.zh: 不要脱身，你才刚进来 我对你有信心

translation.en: One day, it will be you sitting here...
translation.zh: 有一天会换你坐在这里

translation.en: ...telling some Young Turk the facts of life.
translation.zh: 跟一个土耳其年轻人谈人生

translation.en: And they are, Mr. Temple?
You're born, you take shit.
Get out in the world, you take more shit.
Climb a little higher, you take less shit.
translation.zh: 爬高一点，鸟事就少一点

translation.en: Until one day, you're up in the rarefied atmosphere...
...and you've forgotten what shit even looks like.
Welcome to the layer cake, son.
This thing ends here, tonight. You understand?
translation.zh: 这件事今晚在此结束，懂吗？

translation.en: Drug money's easy money, not grief.
translation.zh: 贩毒赚的是不义之财 不是血汗钱

translation.en: The odds, as you can see, are against you.
Good night.
If you're gonna hang around in this game...
...that's where you've got to aim to be.
In your bonded warehouse with the ex-soldiers doing the dirty work...
translation.zh: 坐在仓库里和退伍军人 干非法勾当

translation.en: ...while you deliver the suspect lecture...
...to baffle your opponents and cover your tracks.
translation.zh: 让敌人困惑，也掩饰行踪

translation.en: The art of good business is being a good middleman.
translation.zh: 好生意的艺术 在于当个好的中间人

translation.en: Putting people together. I'll always thank Eddie for telling me that.
translation.zh: 好好撮合大家 我会永远感谢艾迪告诉我这些

translation.en: It's all about honor and respect.
translation.zh: 最重要的是荣誉与尊重

translation.en: This is the end, Mr. Duke, as I told you.
translation.zh: 公爵，我说过这是你的下场

translation.en: Do you know what? I fucking enjoyed that, brother.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？我真的很喜欢这样

translation.en: Just like the old days, Shanks. A nice bit of armed robbery.
translation.zh: 就像以前 一场漂亮的持枪抢劫

translation.en: All right? Where do you want the money sent, lah?
I'll let you know as soon as I do. Again, I am sorry about Lucky.
translation.zh: 我会尽快让你知道 再次对来福感到遗憾

translation.en: Don't worry about it, kidder. Man was a prick, anyway. Later.
translation.zh: 没关系，反正他是蠢货 回头见

translation.en: -Ready? -Yeah. Let's go.
Did I really think Eddie was gonna give me 3 million for those pills?
translation.zh: 我真的以为艾迪 会给我三百万买货吗？

translation.en: Did I, fuck.
But suddenly there was a void where once there was Jimmy Price.
translation.zh: 但突然间我感到吉米回来了

translation.en: After a couple days, Eddie's little "getting in and getting out" speech...
translation.zh: 几天后，艾迪下海再脱身的说法 （史托公园俱乐部 终身会员）

translation.en: ...started to make sense.
-Angelo. Thank you. -Thank you very much.
-Can we get some privacy? -Of course.
The king is dead.
Long live the king.
Well, I'm honored.
But for me this is all over. I'm getting out.
translation.zh: 但一切结束了，我要退出

translation.en: What was true then is true now.
translation.zh: 以前的道理现在也适用

translation.en: Have a plan. Stick to it.
So I'm sure you must have lots to discuss...
translation.zh: 相信你们有很多要讨论

translation.en: ...but I have no business being here.
I've got someone to meet.
Adiós, amigos.
Paul the boatman.
Kinky.
The Duke.
Slasher.
Kilburn Jerry.
Crazy Larry.
Mr. Lucky.
Troop.
Jimmy.
I don't want to add my name to that list.
translation.zh: 我不想让自己登上那名单

translation.en: My name? If you knew that, you'd be as clever as me.
translation.zh: 我的名字？你知道的话 就跟我一样精明了

translation.en: No!
I'm sorry.
